title: SILVER - Looking for a Toplaner
body:
Hello, we call ourselves Vivid Realiti (VVD) and we play in a LCS Style League. This League has an offseason tournament starting January and the normal split that starts at the start of February. We are currently looking for a Toplaner to fill in our roster.

NO Smurfs, max Silver1 end of season8
English speaking and communicative

If you‘re interessted and meet the rank restrictions, we need to signup for the offseason tournament until tonight and urgently need a toplaner who would like to dedicatedly play with us. Hit me up on discord. (> skilled player#6239 <). Have a good day, happy new year.
